column5: Explore unprecedented opportunities in the booming field of business analytics.With the increasing importance of business analytics, the talent to analyze and demystify Big Data is in growing demand.The first of its kind in Canada, the Schulich Master of Business Analytics (MBAN) is a 12-month full-time program, designed to give you the tools and techniques to become an expert in this evolving, high-demand field.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
